report.title: Trending people for an event
report.description: Gives a list of top 10 recent contributors, with their number of records. Ideal for populating a 'trends cloud'.
report.query: SELECT COALESCE(default_common_name, preferred_taxon) as species, records, greatest(11, cast((15 - (sqrt(#records_to_scan#) / sqrt(records)))*2.5 as integer)) as font_size FROM ( SELECT default_common_name, preferred_taxon, count(id) as records FROM (SELECT o.id, o.default_common_name, o.preferred_taxon FROM cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.survey_id=#survey_id# AND o.date_start>='#date_from#' AND o.date_start<='#date_to#' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #records_to_scan#) list GROUP BY default_common_name, preferred_taxon ORDER BY count(id) DESC LIMIT #recorders_to_return# ) AS list ORDER BY COALESCE(default_common_name, preferred_taxon) ASC

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
